name: Burnt Out
description:
You are a viking who needs to keep your fire baby alive, and help it grow (both in size and "age")! Chop down trees to feed it wood, and use seeds to grow more trees. Can you make it grow to "old age", or will it die due to your mismanagement of exploring, planting, chopping, and feeding?

Burnt Out is made by myself (programming), my nephew (who is 12 years old) doing the art, and my brother making the music/sfx.
